00040 #ifndef eventcollision_h
00041 #define eventcollision_h
00042 
00043 #include "actorbase.h"
00044 #include "crossplatformexport.h"
00045 #include "datatypes.h"
00046 #include "eventbase.h"
00047 #include "vector3.h"
00048 
00049 namespace phys {
00050     /// @class EventCollision
00051     /// @headerfile eventcollision.h
00052     /// @brief This is an event class used to track collsions in the physics world.
00053     /// @details This class will be used for tracking collisions in the physics world and will keep track of basic data related to the collision.
00054     class PHYS_LIB EventCollision : public EventBase
00055     {
00056         public:
00057             /// @brief The location in the world where the collision occured, based on physics shapes.
00058             Vector3 Location;
00059             /// @brief The amount of force of the collision.
00060             Real Impulse;
00061             /// @brief The first Actor involved in the collision.
00062             ActorBase* ActorA;
00063             /// @brief The second Actor invovled in the collision.
00064             ActorBase* ActorB;
00065 
00066             /// @brief Class Constructor.
00067             /// @details This will construct a basic event class with the minimum data needed.
00068             /// @param actora The first Actor involved in the collision.
00069             /// @param actorb The second Actor invovled in the collision.
00070             /// @param location The location in the world where the collision occured, based on physics shapes.
00071             /// @param impulse The amount of force of the collision.
00072             EventCollision(ActorBase* actora, ActorBase* actorb, Vector3 location, Real impulse);
00073             /// @brief Class Destructor.
00074             /// @details Basic Class Destructor.
00075             virtual ~EventCollision();
00076             /// @brief This returns EventType::Collision.
00077             /// @details  This returns the kind of message this is, specifcally EventType::Collision.  This method is inherited from phys::Event. .
00078             virtual EventType GetType() const;
00079     };
00080 }
00081 
00082 #endif
